## useChatActions() function

A React hook that returns a ChatHeadless instance with setter methods to update state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useChatActions(): ChatHeadless;
```
**Returns:**

ChatHeadless

## Remarks

This hook must be used only within [ChatHeadlessProvider()](./anguyen-chat-headless-react-test.chatheadlessprovider.md)<!-- -->. Otherwise, it will throw an error.
